channel.title: HGTV's Design Happens
channel.description: Design happens everywhere---you just have to know where to look! Decorating editor Caren Baginski dishes with HGTV’s hottest designers...from Design Star winner Kim Myles to hunky carpenter, Carter Oosterhouse. HGTV is your link online to all things design!
channel.copyright: © 2008 Scripps Networks, LLC. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: HGTV's Design Happens
channel.itunes:summary: Design happens everywhere---you just have to know where to look! Decorating editor Caren Baginski dishes with HGTV’s hottest designers...from Design Star winner Kim Myles to hunky carpenter, Carter Oosterhouse. HGTV is your link online to all things design!
channel.itunes:author: HGTV
channel.itunes:keywords: HGTV, home, garden, design, designers, design star, home and garden, house, interior, interior design, HG, television

item.title: Carter Oosterhouse (Part 2)
item.description: The conclusion of our two part interview with HGTV's red hot Carter Oosterhouse...

item.title: Design Star Reunion: Sparkle Josh!
item.description: The finale of our Design Star reunion concludes with a big bang...and a little sparkle! We're chatting it up with HGTV's very own "Be-Dazzler" Josh Johnson.
